trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Auburn
There were no other sightings in Auburn on or around January 29th 2009
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting DetailsHi, I'm not making any claims here, I didn't see this thing but my camera caught it. I would like to know if anyone has seen something similar to this. We live on a farm in the country and something was setting off my driveway sensor for several nights. Our dog Charlie was disturbed about this but I was unable to spot the source of his concern. After several nights I installed my wildlife camera below the driveway sensor and captured the attached images. The quality is not that great. I have no idea what could have made this light. The camera was facing north into the woods on a hill, no way it could have been a car or lights from afar. Any info on similar light formations would be appreciated.
Summary: Vertical light appeared from the woods - set off driveway alarm.
